properties.title: Quiz
properties.shortDescription: A set of questions to evaluate the knowledge, passion or dedication that a new member put into your Nova (or a specific topic). Useful for onboarding qualified Roles, and easy to repurpose for Badges, POAPs, and Voting Credentials.
properties.longDescription: A set of questions to evaluate the knowledge, passion or dedication that a new member put into your Nova (or a specific topic). Useful for onboarding qualified Roles, and easy to repurpose for Badges, POAPs, and Voting Credentials.
